message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
Considering inflation, I think this is more than fair.
I'm willing to give a little more to get this done, Bob.  Let's call it a compromise.
Inflation is eating into my share. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm starting to feel the pinch of inflation too, Bob.  Let's split it closer to what you proposed last round, but still be fair.
Inflation is really hurting me now. If we don't agree soon, we'll both lose.
